callToAction.title: Let's work together
callToAction.description: If you are looking for a developer to help you with your project, feel free to contact me.

hero.briefcase: I am a full stack developer with a passion for creating efficient and scalable applications. I have experience in various technologies and enjoy solving complex problems.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Jonathan García, a developer based in Ecuador with a strong focus on algorithms and software optimization. My journey began at 14 through a curiosity about how video games are made, which led me to programming and problem solving. I enjoy competitive programming, working on challenging projects, and building efficient solutions. I've collaborated to create impactful digital products. Outside of coding, I enjoy video games, music, and anime Steins;Gate is my favorite. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.

expertise.title: My Expertise
expertise.subtitle: What I do
expertise.description: Here are some of things I can do

areas.title: Web Development
areas.content: Design and development of modern, scalable, and user-friendly web applications.

areas.title: Data Automation & Scraping
areas.content: Automation of repetitive tasks and extraction of structured data from websites and online platforms.

areas.title: DevOps & Deployment
areas.content: Deployment and maintenance of applications with focus on scalability, reliability, and environment management.

areas.title: UI/UX & Prototyping
areas.content: Design of clean, functional interfaces and interactive prototypes with a user-centered approach.

work.title: My work
work.subtitle: Selected Projects
work.description: Here are some of my projects that I have worked on recently.

profile.title: Building solutions & Optimizing systems.
profile.description: I'm a full stack developer who loves building smooth, scalable apps. I've worked with different technologies and enjoy tackling tricky problems while always learning something new.

experience.title: Work History
experience.subtitle: Experience
experience.description: Here are some of the companies I have worked for and the roles I have held.

activities: Led the migration of a legacy system, overseeing the entire process from designing the new architecture to the final implementation, ensuring a smooth transition and enhanced system capabilities.
Developed web systems using Vue.js and Node.js to automate tasks, reducing manual workload and human review.
Engineered programs to access devices via SSH and apply configurations, improving system administration.
Collaborated with the networking team to optimize automation solutions, enhancing overall performance.
Migrated the inventory system from Excel to a web-based platform, boosting process speed by 20% and improving operational visibility.
Designed PostgreSQL databases and developed RESTful APIs with FastAPI to support scalable and secure backend operations.
Collaborated with frontend teams to enhance dashboard features and optimize user experience.
Taught algorithm analysis, guiding students through exercises and problem-solving strategies.
Mentored students on algorithm implementation and optimization, preparing them for competitions.
Developed educational content and provided individual support to enhance understanding of key concepts.
Developed scalable server-side applications using JavaScript, Node.js, and React to meet customer needs.
Designed and implemented new features, improving software functionality and business outcomes.
Conducted testing and debugging to ensure high-quality, reliable software in production.
Contributed to the development of new electronic billing features, enhancing system functionality.
Implemented solutions using Clojure, addressing reported issues and improving performance.
Collaborated with the team to maintain and upgrade existing applications, ensuring seamless software operation.

connect.title: Connect with me
connect.subtitle: Let's code something amazing together

form.success: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you as soon as possible.
form.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

connect.contactCard: If you are looking for a developer to help you with your project, feel free to contact me. I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Let's create something amazing together!

questions.title: What is your current role?
questions.content: I am currently working as a Full Stack developer, focusing on web development and data automation.

questions.title: How much doest it cost for a project?
questions.content: The cost of a project depends on its complexity and requirements. I offer competitive rates and I'm open to discussing your budget.

questions.title: How can I contact you?
questions.content: You can contact me through the contact form on this website. I will get back to you as soon as possible.

questions.title: Are you available for new projects or freelance work?
questions.content: Yes, I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out to me through the contact form.

questions.title: Where can I see examples of your work?
questions.content: You can check out my Projects section to see some of the projects I have worked on recently. I am constantly updating it with new work.
